data.PagetitleText: Part I: Determining Strategies and Response Plan
data.InstructionQuestionText: Before you enter the hot zone to complete your assessment, your team needs to develop an initial sampling plan for the IC's approval. Which of these items should your sampling plan include?
data.optionRolloverText1: Constituents for which you are sampling
data.optionRolloverText5: Number of samples to be taken
data.optionRolloverText9: Social Security Numbers of team members
